## Python venv info

Instructions on how to create a virtual environment for DL course:

1. Launch Anaconda Prompt. In it execute:

```
python -m venv dl_venv
```

2. Activate the environment:
```
dl_venv\Scripts\activate
```

3. Install required packages:
```
pip install jupyter matplotlib scipy numpy scikit-learn termcolor h5py
```

4. Run Jupyter:
```
jupyter notebook
```

5. Voila! (pardon my French)
